Initializer# init(program:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
init(program: UnlitMaterial.Program)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/RealityKit/UnlitMaterial/init(program:)#see-also)

### [Creating an unlit material](/documentation/RealityKit/UnlitMaterial/init(program:)#Creating-an-unlit-material)

[`init()`](/documentation/realitykit/unlitmaterial/init())Creates an unlit material.[`init(applyPostProcessToneMap: Bool)`](/documentation/realitykit/unlitmaterial/init(applypostprocesstonemap:))Creates an UnlitMaterial with the given tone mapping setting[`init(texture: TextureResource)`](/documentation/realitykit/unlitmaterial/init(texture:))Creates a new unlit material with the provided color texture.
